sen.j: また正嘉本源氏物語古系図のように源氏物語54帖のうち並びの巻を除いた37帖のうち宇治十帖全体を「宇治」1帖として数え、源氏物語全体を28帖であるとしているものもある。
sen.e: According to the old genealogical tree in Shoka bon (book written in the Shoka period), 17 quires of Narabi no Kan (Resemblance chapters) are counted out from 54 quires of Genji Monogatari, and Uji jujo is counted as 1 quire of 'Uji, ' and thus the total number of quires comes down to 28.

sen.j: 大きく橋姫から早蕨までの「大君・中の君物語」と宿木から夢浮橋までの「浮舟物語」とに分けられることがある。
sen.e: Uji jujo is often divided roughly into two parts: the first part is 'the Tale of Oigimi and Naka no Kimi' (the Tale of the Oldest and Second-oldest Sisters) which is from Hashihime to Sawarabi (Early Ferns), and the second part is 'the Tale of Ukifune' (the Tale of a Boat upon the Waters) which is from Yadorigi (the Ivy) to Yume no Ukihashi.
